paper_keywords: Partially varying coefficient single index proportional hazards models
paper_abstract: In this paper, the partially varying coefficients single index proportional hazards regression models are discussed. All unknown functions are fitted by polynomial B splines. The index parameters and B-spline coefficients are estimated by the partial likelihood method and a two-step Newton-Raphson algorithm. Consistency and asymptotic normality of the estimators of all the parameters are derived. Through a simulation study and the VA data example, we illustrate that the proposed estimation procedure is a accurate, rapid and stable. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Partially varying coefficient single index proportional hazards regression models
